column4: Just a small usability tip: Use the maintainer's version of GRUB. It looks better.
ok, if you think so, it's just a boot menu that's diplsyed for 4 seconds
the mainterers version ?? what are you talking about
I don't need a picture, what is the maintainers version ?
update-grub just updates the menu list with new kernels
that is the default version of grub in ubuntu
tips are only useful if a.) people are having a problem b.) you actually know/understand the advice your offering
people are asking for help in the channel - follow the quesitons and contribute if you can
please check your private messages I need to speak to you
